name: 江謝令涵
objective:
本課程由微觀經濟學角度出發，分析各種環境問題，並介紹各種經濟誘因行政策工具，以補足傳統環境工程教育偏重工程面之不足。
This course applies theories in micro economics to analyze environmental problems. Policy tools that are often applied in solving environmental problems are further introduced and being evaluated using micro economic principals.
schedule:
1.	Basic assumptions of microeconomics
2.	Market economy
3.	Market failure and externality
4.	Policy tools: Command & Control
5.	Policy tools: market-based policies
6.	Cap-and-trade exercise
7.	Time value of money
8.	Time value of money: inflation
9.	Cost and benefit analysis: benefits
10.	Cost and benefit analysis: costs
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG6：潔淨水與衛生（Clean Water and Sanitation）SDG7：可負擔的潔淨能源（Affordable and Clean Energy）SDG8：尊嚴就業與經濟發展（Decent Work and Economic Growth）SDG11：永續城市與社區（Sustainable Cities and Communities）SDG12：負責任的消費與生產（Responsible Consumption and Production）SDG13：氣候行動（Climate Action）
